EmailTemplate.subject: Want to do a Live Different Builds Internship this summer?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Livedifferent.com
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}!
We hope you are doing well and having a great start to this new year.
After volunteering on a recent Live Different Build, you indicated on your evaluation that you would be interested in our Builds Internships. Maybe you were wanting to be an intern yourself, or maybe you know someone who would be really good for an experience like this?
Builds Internships are a great way to dive a little deeper into international development and to learn more about what we do here at Live Different. Our interns arrive early for the Build Trip, and stay for a few days after other volunteers leave. During these extra days interns spend time with Live Different staff and learn more about leadership, teamwork, and communication. During the Build itself, interns are given positions that involve more responsibility and opportunity for leadership, all while being supervised and encouraged by our staff.
We have two options for Builds Internships this year, in the Dominican Republic and Mexico.
Dominican Republic - July 2nd-15th, 2016
Mexico - August 1st-14th, 2016
Right now, there are still spots available for both of these Builds Internship locations, but we only accept 10 interns in each location, so please apply soon if you're interested! If you know of others who may benefit from an opportunity like this, please forward this on to them as well!
If you like the thought of a Builds Internship, but want to do even more, make sure to contact us about our Live Different Academy program. It's a pretty amazing opportunity to spend 13 weeks learning and serving in Mexico!
If you have any questions feel free to get back to us at any time. We'd love to chat with you!
Sincerely,
The Builds Team
